Package Actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Any object of this type must have a method that executes necessary algorithm to carry-out the action it represents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCompanyAction
    This class performs the action of adding a company in the program.
    AddShareholderAction
    This class performs the action of adding a shareholder to the program
    AddSharesAction
    This method performs the action of adding a share to the program
    AdministrateCompaniesAction
    This class accesses the Administrate Companies Menu in the project
    AdministrateShareholdersAction
    This class gets the Administrate Shareholders submenu
    AdministrationStocksAction
    This class performs the action of getting the Administration of Stocks menu
    BuyAction
    This class performs the action of buying shares from a company
    ExitAction
    This class performs the exit action from the current menu, if the menu is the Main Menu it stops the execution of the program.
    PerformTransactionAction
    This class get the menu for performing a buy or sell transaction
    RemoveCompanyAction
    This method performs the action of removing a company from the project.
    RemoveShareholderAction
    This class performs the action of removing a shareholder from the program
    SellAction
    This class performs action of selling shares to a particular company
    ShowPortfolioAction
    This class performs the action of showing the shareholder's portfolio
    ShowReportAction
    This class performs the action of showing a company's report
    SplitOperationAction
    This class performs the split operation on a specific company
    UpdateShareValueAction
    This class performs the action of updating the value of a company's share
